short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you irritated with the Sarahah posts on your Facebook?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you irritated with the posts on your Facebook feed about Sarahah? 

Don't want to see them anymore? Well, then Sarahah Filter is exactly what you need. Install the browser extension and live Sarahah free. 

Sarahah is a great way for people to get anonymous and honest feedback from their peers on social media. However the overwhelming user-generated content has become a growing nuisance to a lot of people. With this extension you will be to scroll through your Facebook without ever having to see a Sarahah post.
